casebody.data:
No. 10-315. Sonic Automotive, Inc., dba Century BMW, Petitioner v. Christine Watts, et al. 563 U.S. 971, 131 S. Ct. 2872,

179 L. Ed. 2d 1184,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3532. May 2, 2011.

Petition for writ of certio-rari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the Supreme Court of South Carolina for further consideration in light of AT&T Mobility LLC v. Concepcion, 563 U.S. 333, 131 S. Ct. 1740, 179 L. Ed. 2d 742 (2011).

Same case below, 387 S.C. 525, 693 S.E.2d 394.
